content.question: Historians could best use the excerpt as an example of which of the following?

choices.label: Expansion of voting rights during the Jackson administration
Debates over the separation of church and state in the United States
Advocacy for policies promoting the idea of Manifest Destiny
Political responses to changing demographics in the United States

content.answer: Political responses to changing demographics in the United States

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
